channel.title: Idaho Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Idaho Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-27 North at I-84 West Onramp
item.description: ID-27 north to Paul at I-84 west to Twin Falls and Boise (Exit 208).

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-6 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-6 east.

item.title: ID-8 East at US-95
item.description: ID-8 east at US-95. ID-8 joins US-95 south through Moscow.

item.title: ID-8 East at US-95
item.description: ID-8 east at US-95. Follow US-95 South/ID-8 East for Troy and Lewiston. Use US-95 North for Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-8 East Approaching US-95
item.description: ID-8 east approaching US-95.

item.title: Jct. US-95 on ID-8 East
item.description: Jct. US-95 on ID-8 East

item.title: ID-8 East at Perimeter Drive
item.description: ID-8 east at Perimeter Drive. Use Perimeter Drive south for the Kibbie Dome at the University of Idaho.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-8 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-8 east. Entering Moscow. Moscow is home to the University of Idaho.

item.title: Leaving Coeur d'Alene Indian Reservation
item.description: Leaving the Coeur d’Alene Indian Reservation on ID-60 west at the Idaho-Washington State Line.

item.title: End ID-60
item.description: End ID-60 West at Washington State Line

item.title: ID-3 north at ID-6
item.description: ID-3 north at ID-6. The White Pine Scenic Byway follows ID-3 north from here to Rose Lake.

item.title: ID-3 North Approaching ID-6
item.description: ID-3 north approaching ID-6. Use ID-6 west for Potlatch. Use ID-3 north for St. Maries and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-8 West at ID-3
item.description: ID-8 west at ID-3. ID-8 west joins ID-3 south to Deary. Use ID-8/ID-3 for Deary and Moscow. Use ID-3 north for St. Maries.

item.title: ID-8 West At ID-3
item.description: ID-8 west at ID-3.

item.title: ID-8 West Approaching ID-3
item.description: ID-8 west approaching ID-3.

item.title: Elk River Back Country Byway
item.description: Elk River Back Country Byway on Elk River Road at the south end of Elk River Reservoir.

item.title: Michigan Ave. at ID-7
item.description: Michigan Ave. south at ID-7. Use ID-7 east for US-12.

item.title: ID-7 in Orofino
item.description: ID-7 (Michigan Ave.) at Riverside Ave. Turn left to continue on ID-7

item.title: End ID-11 at US-12
item.description: End ID-11 west at US-12.

item.title: Gold Rush Historic Byway
item.description: Gold Rush Historic Byway sign on ID-11.

item.title: End ID-64/ID-162 at US-12
item.description: End ID-64/ID-162 at US-12. Use US-12 west for Orofino. Use US-12 east for Kooskia and Missoula (Montana).

item.title: End ID-162 and ID-64 at US-12
item.description: End ID-162/ID-64 at US-12.

item.title: ID-162 South at ID-64
item.description: ID-162 south at ID-64. Use ID-64 west for Nezperce (via SH-64). Use ID-64/ID-162 east for Kooskia and Orofino.

item.title: ID-64/ID-162 West at Split
item.description: ID-64/ID-162 West at Split. Both highways go to Nezperce on the Camas Prairie. ID-162 is the truck route.

item.title: ID-64/ID-162 West Approaching Split
item.description: ID-64/ID-162 West approaching ID-64/ID-162 split.

item.title: ID-162/ID-64 in Kamiah
item.description: ID-162/ID-64 west on Hill St. Turn right on 5th St. to continue on ID-162/ID-64.

item.title: End ID-13 North at US-12
item.description: End ID-13 north at US-12. Use US-12 west for Kamiah and Lewiston. Use US-12 east for Missoula (Montana).

item.title: ID-13 South - Nez Perce Trail
item.description: Begin ID-13 south. ID-13 is signed as the Nez Perce Trail and Northwest Passage Scenic Byway.

item.title: End ID-13 north at US-12
item.description: End ID-13 north at US-12

item.title: ID-27 North at I-84 West Onramp
item.description: ID-27 north to Paul at I-84 west to Twin Falls and Boise.

item.title: ID-27 North at I-84 Onramp
item.description: BL-84 West/ID-27 North at I-84 (Exit 208). Merge right for I-84 East/Ogden (Utah)/Pocatello. Continue over bridge for I-84 West/Twin Falls and ID-27 North to Paul.
